[b]Benjamin Franklin Gates descends from a family of treasure-seekers
who've all hunted for the same thing: 
a war chest hidden by the Founding Fathers after the Revolutionary War. 
Ben's close to discovering its whereabouts, as is his competition, 
but the FBI is also hip to the hunt.[/b]
